sentences.english: I like the blue one in the window.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢橱窗里的那个蓝色的。

sentences.english: It's snowing out of shopwindow, snow flakes dancing in the air.
sentences.chinese: 橱窗外正在下着雪，雪花在空中飞舞。

sentences.english: My mouth often watered at the sight of choclate in the window.
sentences.chinese: 我一看到橱窗里的巧克力就垂涎欲滴。

sentences.english: He sauntered along Oxford Street looking at the shopwindows.
sentences.chinese: 他沿牛津街漫步观看商店的橱窗。

sentences.english: Sportswear manufacturers have no better showcase.
sentences.chinese: 运动衣制造商没有比这更好的展示橱窗了。

sentences.english: She loitered along the street, looking into all the show windows.
sentences.chinese: 她沿街闲逛，看所有的橱窗摆设。

sentences.english: The pies in the store window made my mouth water.
sentences.chinese: 店铺橱窗里摆的馅饼我馋涎欲滴。

sentences.english: A: I like the yellow pants in the window.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢橱窗中的那件黄色毛衣。

sentences.english: The department store hired professional designer to display its goods in the window.
sentences.chinese: 百货商店聘请了专业设计师在其橱窗里陈列商品。

sentences.english: Some middle school students are window-shopping outside the department store.
sentences.chinese: 一些中学生在百货商店外面看橱窗。

sentences.english: The iron shutters came down over the shopwindows .
sentences.chinese: 商店的橱窗拉下了铁遮板。

sentences.english: In the showcases were displayed various kinds of goods.
sentences.chinese: 橱窗里陈列著各种商品。

sentences.english: A new dress caught my eye in Harrod's window.
sentences.chinese: 哈罗德橱窗内的一件新衣引起了我人注意。

sentences.english: We went to window-shopping at afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 我们下午去浏览商店橱窗。

sentences.english: All the windows were boarded up.
sentences.chinese: 商店的橱窗拉下了铁遮板。

sentences.english: The window displays allure customers to buy goods.
sentences.chinese: 橱窗陈列品吸引顾客购买货物。

definition: market/store/mall (usually specializing in a particular product category such as furniture)
shopping mall/shopping center/department store/emporium/CL:家[jia1]/the business world
triforium (gallery of arches above side-aisle vaulting in the nave of a church)
customer area of a store/showroom/dining area of a restaurant
